entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
